modName: Straightforward Quivers - Ebony Orcish Glass and Elven Arrows
summary: Reshapes some of the more extravagant quivers to make them a bit more practical.
descriptionHtml:
Some of the vanilla quivers were a bit to over-the-top for my liking. So, this!

This reshapes a few quivers to make them more simplistic, and, admittedly, more boring. But I like them, so I thought I\'d share.

This goes in line with my Straightforward Blades series which pretty much does the same thing, but with swords.
author: Kyim
